moves.3. Bb5: Probably the strongest of all the KP openings for White.
moves.3... a6: Offering a choice of the Exchange Variation or the more usual lines.
moves.4... d6: The deferred version of the Steinitz Defense.
moves.8... Qxg5: Fischer pounces at once. White resigns, as after 9 BxQ BxQ 10 KxB NxP, he is down a whole piece with no compensation.
